您是第一个流动性提供者。

选择一个通证来查找您的流动性
installMetamask: 请从安装了 newton-extension 的 Chrome浏览器 或 Firefox浏览器 访问。
betaWarning: 项目尚处于测试阶段，请自行承担风险。
searchOrPaste: 搜索通证或粘贴通证合约地址
invalidRecipient: 请输入有效的钱包地址。
mustBeETH: 输入中必须有一个是 NEW。
enterCurrencyOrLabelCont: 输入 {{ inputCurrency }} 或 {{ label }} 值并继续。
totalSupplyIs: 当前流动性通证的总量是
youAreSettingExRate: 你将初始兑换率设置为
totalSupplyIs0: 当前流动性通证的总量是0。
tokenWorth: 当前兑换率下，每个资金池通证价值
firstLiquidity: 你是第一个添加流动资金的人！
initialExchangeRate: 初始兑换率将由你的存入情况决定。请确保你存入的 NEW 和 {{ label }} 具有相同的总市值。
enterLabelCont: 输入 {{ label }} 值并继续。
label: 通证符号
enterTokenCont: 输入通证合约地址并继续
findPairsTips: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
addLiquidityTips: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
removingPoolTips: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
nameUpdated: The token list "{{ oldName }}" has been updated to
commonBasesTokens: These tokens are commonly paired with other tokens.
searchToken: Find a token by searching for its name or symbol or by pasting its address below.
confirmRemove: Please confirm you would like to remove this list by typing REMOVE
addListTips: Token lists are an open specification for lists of NRC6 tokens. You can use any token list by entering its URL below. Beware that third party token lists can contain fake or malicious NRC6 tokens.
expertMode: Expert mode turns off the confirm transaction prompt and allows high slippage trades that often result in bad rates and lost funds.
useExpertMode: ONLY USE THIS MODE IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
confirmExpertMode: Please type the word 'confirm' to enable expert mode.
expertModeRisk: Bypasses confirmation modals and allows high slippage trades. Use at your own risk.
transactionQuestionHelper: Your transaction will revert if there is a large, unfavorable price movement before it is confirmed.
priceQuestionHelper: The difference between the market price and estimated price due to trade size.
feeQuestionHelper: A portion of each trade (0.30%) goes to liquidity providers as a protocol incentive.
routeQuestionHelper: Routing through these tokens resulted in the best price for your trade.
betterPrice: There is a better price for this trade on
yourPriceQuestionHelper: The difference between the market price and your price due to trade size.
transactionRevert: Your transaction will revert if the price changes unfavorably by more than this percentage.
transactionRevertForLong: Your transaction will revert if it is pending for more than this long.
yourLiquidityQuestion: When you add liquidity, you are given pool tokens that represent your share. If you don’t see a pool you joined in this list, try importing a pool below.
gasError: Unexpected issue with estimating the gas. Please try again.
slippageError: This transaction will not succeed either due to price movement or fee on transfer. Try increasing your slippage tolerance.
transactionError: The transaction cannot succeed due to error
tokenError: This is probably an issue with one of the tokens you are swapping.
unexpectedError: Unexpected error. Please contact support: none of the calls threw an error
